Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Strange sounds can be heard all day and night, making it difficult to sleep.'}
{2: '(Check it out)', 3: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'Following the source of the sound, you find a dormitory that appears to have been retrofitted into a studio.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'A person is inside working busily beside the bed.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, it's you, Commandant. What's up?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What are you doing?', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What does it look like?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The desktop is covered with what appears to be building blocks...'}
{3: 'Upon closer inspection, the blocks appear to be arranged in a frame resembling a question mark.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I'm creating a puzzle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's the latest work I'm going to show.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'It\'s something that was referred to as "installation art" during the Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The point of this piece is to raise "questions" for the viewers.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'A puzzle?', 3: '24', 4: '"Installation art"?', 5: '25'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'It\'s an art piece... designed to raise "questions" for the viewers.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Yes, it was a type of artwork during the Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Using an "installation" to propose "puzzles" and "views" for the audience is an important form of expression.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So, Commandant, do you know how to solve this puzzle?', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Examine closely)', 3: '29'}
{3: 'Aside from the "question mark," it just looks like a bunch of strangely-shaped blocks...'}
{3: 'Looking more closely, you see some peculiar blocks among the others.'}
{3: 'Maybe because you frequently have to link your consciousness with others in battle, you seem to be more acutely attuned to the shape of signals.'}
{2: '(Pick up a block)', 3: '35'}
{3: 'The shape of the blocks appears to match the question mark.'}
{3: 'Or rather, be inserted into it...'}
{3: 'After rotating the blocks a few times, blocks along the bend of the question mark appear to fit together.'}
{3: 'Maneuvering the blocks once more, you turn the question mark into an exclamation mark.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Well, you really are worthy of being a commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I was thinking of saving the answer for the exhibit...', 4: '1'}
